name: TransplantPatientsFAQ
0:
”Alexa, open transplant patients”
”Alexa, ask transplant patients if I can take tylenol”
”Alexa, ask transplant patients what prednisone does”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: transplant patients
des:
This is a skill I have created to add to the plethora of questions we have received at the pharmacy for transplant patients. I will continue to add to this.

**The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number**
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
